text: Juan Ignacio Aranda (born Ignacio López Aranda on February 6, 1962 in Mexico City, Mexico) is a Mexican actor. He began his training in 1978 in Centro de Arte Dramático (CADAC), also studied in The Cockpit Arts Workshop and in The City Lit (London), in Centro Universitario de Teatro of Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM) and in United States International University in San Diego, California. == Filmography == === Film roles === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
